roleset.name: assess
roleset.note: AUDIT-V NOTES: Verbnet class assessment-34.1 (from audit.01-v)

example.name: death and taxes
example.text: The Illinois Supreme Court ordered [the commission]-2 *trace* -2 to audit Commonwealth Edison's construction expenses and refund any unreasonable expenses.

example.name: arg1
example.text: On the morning of the crash , he had been put on notice that an audit committee was recommending his dismissal because of invoicing irregularities in a company audit .

example.name: arg0
example.text: The administration of federal credit should closely parallel private lending practices , including the development of a loan loss reserve and regular outside audits .
